attributes.action: Ask the Chinese Government to look into the barbaric treatment of animals for Fur
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently I come across a link  revealing the horrific treatment to animals for there fur.The terrified animals were battered to death some were still alive & skinned left living for up to 10 minutes.This video haunts me how can the chinese people do such horrific things.Please sign in a bid to try & get it stopped.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ask the Chinese Government to look into the barbaric treatment of animals for Fur."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18527


Prime Minister's Office
